channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report I-2024040073
item.description:
Report I-2024040073

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: Chino
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: OAK HARBOR FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While in unload a 1 gallon can was found beached and Ieaking in the trailer. It is believed the breach was from a forklift blade. The can was removed from it box and placed in a containment drum for disposal with a licensed hazwaste hauler.
